summary: Theme tokens were updated in global CSS and multiple key UI components (header, hero, brand sections/cards, footer) were restyled to use the new tokens with a green/yellow Turtle Wax-inspired palette. However, the diff also appears to introduce unrequested branding/name changes and substantial new/expanded marketing copy, which are outside the requested scope of theme/styling updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/introduced site branding name/slug via environment/config and HTML title (renaming to “Urban Wax Studio”), which was not requested and conflicts with the constraint to keep existing branding behavior unless explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to rename the app unless requested; diff summary indicates branding defaults and .env were set to a specific new name/slug and index.html title updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded non-styling content (brand history/marketing descriptions and other copy changes) beyond theme/styling adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals state not to copy/add new content/layout; requirements focus on theme tokens and Tailwind class adjustments, not rewriting section text.
